name: CloudTrade
overview: Cloudtrade is a mobile social media networking company. Cloudtradeâ€™s mobile software allows users to access and share their music, photos and videos from their cell phones, anytime, anywhere. Cloudtrade provides a mobile media sharing platform that is offering 1GB of storage for free.
